\newcounter{c}
\stepcounter{c}

\newcounter{a}[c]	% c -> a,b -> d
\newcounter{b}[c]
\newcounter{d}[b]

\setcounter{a}{5}
\setcounter{b}{6}
\setcounter{d}{3}

\arabic{a}
\arabic{b}
\arabic{c}
\arabic{d}

\stepcounter{a}
\arabic{a}
\arabic{b}
\arabic{c}
\arabic{d}

\stepcounter{c}
\arabic{a}          % should be reset now due to stepcounter
\arabic{b}          % should be reset now due to stepcounter
\arabic{c}
\arabic{d}

\stepcounter{b}
\arabic{a}
\arabic{b}
\arabic{c}
\arabic{d}
